content.text: Hello! I'm going to be recovering from knee surgery for the next few weeks, but I'm trying to stay positive.
Hello! I hope your recovery goes smoothly. I spent my birthday riding my boat and listening to folk metal. What did you do for your birthday?
I stayed at home and binged on Netflix. I'm too old for boats, I think, but folk metal sounds like a good time! What kind of boat do you have?
I have a 25' pontoon boat. It's perfect for relaxing on the water and listening to music. I'm from Seattle, so I get to enjoy the water all summer long.
That sounds amazing! I'm from Arizona, so I don't get to enjoy the water much. But I do love folk metal. Do you have a favorite band?
My favorite band is Eluveitie. They're a Swiss folk metal band. I love their music because it's so unique and interesting.
I've never heard of them, but I'll check them out! I love discovering new music.
I'm sure you'll like them. They're a lot of fun. So, what do you do for fun?
I like to read, write, and play video games. I also enjoy going out to concerts and events.
Those all sound like great hobbies! I like to read and play video games too. I'm not much of a concert goer, but I do enjoy going to events.
We should get together sometime and do something fun! I'm free this weekend if you are.
I'm free too! I'd love to hang out. What do you want to do?
We could go to a concert or a movie. We could also go out to dinner or just hang out at my place.
I'm up for anything. I'm not familiar with the music scene in Arizona, so I'm open to suggestions.
